title: Senior Category Manager (They/She/He)
content:
YOUR MISSION
In the context of ‚Äúgiving users easy access to anything in their city‚Äù, Q-commerce is the business unit that covers 3 verticals: Groceries, Retail and Micro Fulfillment Centers (our own fulfillment channel). We aim to provide immediacy to all product needs that a user might have, from delivering a video game, to sending a gift... to filling up their fridge.
The Q-commerce team is organized in 6 sub-teams: Analytics, Micro Fulfillment Centers Operations & Launch, Delivery operations, Front-end (Marketing, Sales, Account Mgmt. and Category Management), Finance and Retail.
As a Category Manager, you will be responsible for delivering a best-in-class user experience for our customers leading the implementation of the right assortment, categorization, content, pricing, and promotion strategies to win the convenience baskets.
THE JOURNEY


Negotiate with suppliers to ensure new products with correct margins, and in stock


Lead assortment definition and optimization strategy


Execute and analyze dynamic pricing strategies


Be responsible of offering an amazing shopping experience by categorizing & sorting the assortment based on user needs


Develop, implement and track processes to guarantee content strategy execution


Manage promotions and capture cross-selling opportunities


Lead team of 4  


Actively collaborate with your colleagues and learn from each other in a supportive environment that allows you to grow, develop and make a difference


WHAT YOU WILL BRING TO THE RIDE


3-6 years experience in the global market either within FMCG, Retail or on-demand services industry, especially in Category Management, Trade Marketing or Purchase roles


Strong analytical skills, willing to test and solve problems based on data


Great interpersonal skills


Comfortable working in a high growth and high performance start-up with a fast pace


Fluent in English. Additional languages are a plus


An empathetic, inclusive and curious attitude



Individuals representing diverse profiles, encompassing various genders, ethnicities, and backgrounds, are less likely to apply for this role if they do not possess solid experience in 100% of these areas. Even if it seems you don't meet our musts don't let it stop you, we are all about finding the best talent out there! Skills can be learned, and embracing diversity is invaluable.
